All rights reserved.Massively parallel reporter assays (MPRA) enable systematic screening of DNA sequence variants for effects on transcriptional activity. However, convenient analysis agents are still needed. Results: We introduce MPRAscore, a novel agent to infer allele-specific effects on transcription from MPRA data. MPRAscore uses a weighted, variance-regularized method to calculate variant effect sizes robustly, and a permutation approach to test for significance without assuming normality or independence.
metadata.title: MPRAscore: Robust and non-parametric analysis of massively parallel reporter assays
